issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: the keyboardType attribute is not documented for the Titanium.UI.TextField component
fields.summary: keyboardType is not documented for Titanium.UI.TextField

comments.body:
Rasmus

There have been some updates to our APIDocs recently. Would you check [Titanium.UI.TextField|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.TextField-object#properties], [Titanium.UI.TextArea|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.TextArea-object#properties] and [Titanium.UI.SearchBar|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.SearchBar-object#properties] to confirm whether the issues you describe have been adequately addressed?

I will mark this resolved for now. Please reopen it if you disagree.

Thanks
